summary: The module defines a collection of pytest test suites and helper utilities that exercise the Web Map Service (WMS) control widget of the MSS UI. The tests verify XML configuration output, time dimension processing, handling of connection failures, schema validation, single‑ and multi‑layer scenarios, caching behavior, threading constraints, navigation actions, widget initialization, multi‑layer rendering, and map retrieval from a WMS server, while also providing setup and cleanup helpers for the test environment.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the functionality of the WMS control component in the MSS application by automatically detecting regressions and ensuring correct behavior across a wide range of operational conditions.
